sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Demo = () => { const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false); const [uploadedImage, setUploadedImage] = useState(null); const handlePlay = () => { setIsPlaying(true); setTimeout(() => setIsPlaying(false), 5000); }; const handleImageUpload = (event) => { const file = event.target.files[0]; if (file) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = (e) => setUploadedImage(e.target.result); reader.readAsDataURL(file); } }; return (

See Free Image AI in Action

Upload your photo and watch our AI transform it into a professional-quality image in real-time. No complex editing software required.

{/* Left Side - Upload Area */}

Upload Your Photo

Drag and drop or click to select

Supports JPG, PNG, WebP up to 10MB

{/* Demo Features */}

Lightning Fast

Process in seconds

Professional Quality

Studio-grade results

Mobile Friendly

Works on any device

Secure & Private

Your data is safe

{/* Right Side - Video Demo */}
{!isPlaying ? (

Watch Demo

See how it works

) : (

Processing Demo...

This would be your actual video

)}
{/* Video Controls */}
{isPlaying ? '0:15' : '0:00'} / 2:30
{/* Processing Stats */}

Real-time Processing

Image Analysis âœ“ Complete
AI Enhancement In Progress
Quality Check Pending
); }; export default Demo;
